title: AI is stifling new tech adoption?
dot:
digraph AI_Technology_Adoption{rankdir=LR; node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightblue, fontname="Helvetica"]; AI_Impact[label="AI Influence on Tech Adoption" shape=ellipse, color=lightgreen];Knowledge_Gap[label="The Knowledge Gap
(Training Cutoff & Stagnant Models)" shape=ellipse, color=lightyellow];System_Prompt_Influence[label="System Prompt Influence
(Bias Toward Specific Tech)" shape=ellipse, color=lightyellow]; Adoption_Bias[label="AI Bias Towards Popular Technologies (e.g., React, Tailwind)" shape=box];Lack_of_Adoption[label="Stifled Adoption of New Tech
(due to AI Knowledge Gap)" shape=box];Feedback_Loop[label="Inverse Feedback Loop
(Lack of AI Support → Lack of Material)" shape=box];Developer_Decision[label="Developers Choosing Tech Based on AI Support" shape=box]; AI_Influence[label="AI Models Influence Developer Decisions" shape=ellipse, color=lightblue];System_Prompt[label="System Prompts & Preferences (AI Instructions)" shape=ellipse, color=lightblue]; Test_Results[label="AI Test Results (Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, DeepSeek)" shape=ellipse, color=lightgray];Tech_Variation[label="Variation in Technology Choices
